about.title: About me
about.description: I have over 3 years of experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, ReactJS, Next.js, Git, GitHub, and more. I love studying and learning things, thanks to my curiosity and problem-solving experience.

loomi.description: Development of modern web applications using React, Next.js and TypeScript. Implementation of state management with React Query for request optimization and caching. Form and schema validation with Zod, ensuring type-safety and runtime validation. Working with reusable component architecture and clean code patterns.

beecorp.description: Implementation of new features and platform maintenance with React 18, Next.js 14+ and TypeScript. Performed migration from React 16 and Next.js 12 to newer versions, including adjustments with codemods. Implemented internationalization support with react-i18next, expanding operations to USA and Spain. Developed Cora, an AI chatbot integrated with OpenAI, focused on psychological support.

quackity-studios.description: Developed an internal control panel for social media account administration and management using React, Vite, React Router Dom, and TypeScript. Additionally, I was one of the main developers of the QSMP landing page, implementing Next.js with server components, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript for efficient server-side content rendering.

encapse-arquitetura.description: Developed the application using React, Tailwind CSS, React Hook Form with Zod, and implemented functions to send emails to clients and process data, integrating with the company's database.

galorys.description: Developed interactive and responsive user interfaces using React, Styled Components, and TypeScript, delivering a modern and adaptable visual experience. Integrated APIs with the backend to ensure smooth communication between the interface and system functionalities, enabling effective interaction.

shield-ethical.description: Developed an interactive and responsive landing page focused on user experience, following pixel-perfect design principles with high standards. Using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, created a dashboard with a modern and adaptable design.

hide-pagamentos.description: Developed a landing page focused on optimizing user experience, following pixel-perfect design principles to create a modern and adaptable interface. Using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, built a responsive and interactive landing page.

galorys-gta.description: Developed a landing page for a GTA 5 Role Play website, including the design concept in Figma. Technologies used included React, Styled Components, and TypeScript.

uninassau.title: Uninassau - Distance Learning
uninassau.description: I have currently paused my Systems Analysis and Development degree at Uninassau. Although I already have prior knowledge, I recognize the importance of the course to improve my programming skills.
